Title: Fists of Love
Actors: Antonio Alvaira Jr., Gloria Avery, Rob Casasanta, Samantha Rivers Cole
Plot: John(Franky G), a NYC Domestic Violence Officer on edge dealing with his tragic past falls in love with Lina(Frances Lozada), a woman married to an abusive husband Brad (Angel Ramirez). The situation escalates and spirals out of control.
